abstract.title: Abstract
abstract.p: We have read recent articles regarding co‐epidemics/co‐infections of COVID‐19 and other infectious diseases 1‐4, these reports highlights the impact of co‐infections on the health care system. The recent pandemic of COVID‐19 caused by a novel severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus ‐ SARS‐CoV‐2 has taken 378K lives and has spread worldwide infecting over 6.3 million individuals.
This article is protected by copyright. All rights reserved.
